modmenu.descriptionTranslation.socksprox: Use SOCKS proxy to connect to Minecraft server.
socksproxyclient.config.general.tooltip: Configuration of SOCKS proxy to use
A chain of proxies to use.
Assume you have 3 proxies PA, PB, PC, chain of Client-->PA-->PB-->PC-->Target server, PA being 1st hop, PB 2nd, PC 3rd, put PA on top of this list, PB follows, lastly PC.
socksproxyclient.config.general.proxy.te:
Click this button to test your proxy or proxy chain.
Save new settings before click.
socksproxyclient.config.server.tooltip: Configuration for proxy's scope of effectiveness
socksproxyclient.config.server.minecraft: Proxy DNS for Minecraft servers when using Socks 5
By enabling this, remote resolution of Minecraft server domain name will rely on DNS over HTTPS (DoH), communications with DoH servers will go through proxy.
By default, resolution of domain name will first take results from system's host file without further lookup on DNS.
Minecraft client communicates with Mojang's Yggdrasil API service to verify your character, especially upon joining an online server. It uses HTTP protocol to exchange information.
Minecraft client may download necessary skin images to render them in game. It uses HTTP protocol to exchange information.
Proxy Minecraft server resource pack downloading
Minecraft server may give Minecraft client a HTTP url to download server resource pack from.
Minecraft client automatically fetches Mojang's server block list to determine which server has been blocked by Mojang. It uses HTTP protocol to exchange information.
Proxy DNS for HTTP(S) communications when using Socks 5
This setting also applies to DoH. However, if your proxy chain has SOCKS 4 proxy, this setting won't be effective.
Impose proxy on Minecraft servers on loopback address
Mostly you don't need to enable this at all.
socksproxyclient.config.miscellaneous.bu: Show config button in multiplayer screen
